name: ManageTagOperations
description:
Create, update, or manage tags for companies and users.

This tool allows you to create or update tags, and manage tagging or untagging companies and users. It automatically creates new tags if they don't exist, while executing the tagging operations.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the Intercom API version to use for this operation. Accepted values are "1.0" to "2.9".

parameters.name: tag_management_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the operation (create, update, tag, or untag) and relevant entities. Include the tag name or ID and company or user details.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
